title: Open Science Education Design for Lifelong Learning: Online PBL Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific theories and practical field experience
context.additional_context: A process where professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields conduct self-directed science projects in a BYOD environment, receiving continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can complete PBL assignments utilizing open-source scientific data with an 80% or higher completion rate.
Learners can exchange peer evaluations and feedback at least three times via online collaboration tools.
Learners can construct a digital learning portfolio to solve practical problems in the field of science.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
